description:
Just recently this application gave a pop-up about Google Chrome trying to access data outside its home folder. SELinux warned me about this and the Chrome developers fixed the error shortly after that.

This app also notified me of self-written software that didn't have the bin_t context. Instead of adding the context I moved the software to /usr/local/bin where the context is being added automatically. This is an excellent tool!
The notifications are nice but they open a scary and very confusing window. I want security but I shouldn't need to be a security expert to be able to use this.
summary: Good intention, but very hard to understand and use

description:
As I've tried many GNU&non-GNU/Linux(R) Operating Systems from every posible Branch of Linux(R) Kernel based Distors, including Grandpa, Debian9.3 lately,

I finaly decided to move to Fedora Workstation non-testing, first of all, because of Fedora Project's First Class Enterprice Security, which main component is the SELinux, whom I put my trust infront of all the other Gnu/Linux(R) Security Modules. NSA themselves are using SELinux - what could we talk more about - either Fedora's SELinux is FOSS - fully Free & Open Sourice, without any other connections with NSA, except the NSA's initiation of SELinux. 

I mean, whom should you trust?!? British based Debian forks with AppArmor or the Russian Kaspersky(TM) Security Malware?...

Fedora Project is not just FOSS, it's FLOSS - Free & Libre Open Source Software! So I admire the Community, and, of cource, the RedHat(R) Corporation, based in The U.S. of America... THIS IS SECURITY IN IT'S FULL GRADE.
summary: Today Security Is A Top Priority With The Up-to Date Rolling Updates

description: pp poo poo program i cant use looking glass cause some selinux pp poo poo xddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddd
strongly needed on fedora with selinux =(

Every time you run setenforce 0, you make Dan Walsh weep.
Dan is a nice guy and he certainly doesn't deserve that. 

For any salty selinux haters check https://stopdisablingselinux.com/
Very helpful when combined with a basic understanding of SELinux. As always: Dont shoot the messenger.
一般来说，服务器都会把selinux给关了的。。毕竟selinux配置非常繁琐，给开发带来了很大的难度，这个软件可以简化selinux的配置，出现selinux错误就能直接显示解决方案，减少了开发工作
